sections.heading: Property subject to superior mortgage; payment of priceIf there is a security interest, mortgage, lien, or privilege on the property superior to that of the seizing creditor, the purchaser shall pay to the sheriff only that portion of the sale price which exceeds the amount of the superior security
sections.text: Property subject to superior mortgage; payment of priceIf there is a security interest, mortgage, lien, or privilege on the property superior to that of the seizing creditor, the purchaser shall pay to the sheriff only that portion of the sale price which exceeds the amount of the superior security interest, mortgage, lien, or privilege.Acts 1989, No. 137, ยง18, eff. Sept. 1, 1989.
